values.desc: Instructs the receiver to discard all pending MIDI data.
Returns the maximum size of a message this receiver can receive.
Called when the receiver is instructed to discard all pending MIDI data.

values.code: onSend(msg: ByteArray!, offset: Int, count: Int, timestamp: Long)
values.desc: Called whenever the receiver is passed new MIDI data.

values.code: send(msg: ByteArray!, offset: Int, count: Int)
values.desc: Called to send MIDI data to the receiver without a timestamp.

values.code: send(msg: ByteArray!, offset: Int, count: Int, timestamp: Long)
values.desc: Called to send MIDI data to the receiver with a specified timestamp.
